channel.title: Changing home
channel.description: On my server, its a 317 delta. I'm trying to change the home teleport and the respawn point when you die, also new accounts, spawn. I've looked in clicking most but I cant find the home teleport, when I click the home teleport, it teleports you around the old home, but a different spot each time, theres about 4 different spots. Can somebody please help me out.

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

  1. Teleport home
  2. Do ::mypos or ::dataon, and check the coordinates. [for example I find: 3546, 4255]
  3. Open your source folder, and search for 1 of the coordinates [example: 3546]
  4. Open the .java files that appear
  5. Search for the other coordinates [4255]
  6. Change them to the coordinates you want which you can find by ::mypos or ::dataon again
  7. Save Compile Restart
  8. Tell me if it helped

Read full topic

item.title: Changing home
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Get the coordinates for one of those spots, then search for them in the source. Then change it to what you want it to be.

Read full topic
